data.title: "MediaCoder" free software to mutually convert all multimedia files
data.meta_description: A monster free software that made every conversion possible by specializing in work that converts music files and movie files into their preferred formats finally appears.
data.text:
A monster free software that made every conversion possible by specializing in work that converts music files and movie files into their preferred formats finally appears.

MediaCoder - The universal audio / video transcoder

http://mediacoder.sourceforge.net/

The screen is almost universal as you can see by looking like this

http://mediacoder.sourceforge.net/screenshots/mediacoder.png

The formats that can be entered are as follows.

MP3, Ogg Vorbis, AAC, AAC + / Parametric Stereo, AMR NB / WB, MusePack, WMA, RealAudio

FLAC, WavPack, Monkey's Audio (APE, APL), OptimFrog, WMA Lossless, WAV

H.264, Xvid, DivX 4/5, MPEG 1/2/4, H.263, 3 ivx, RealVideo, Windows Media Video 7/8/9, DV

AVI, MPEG / VOB, Matroska, MP4, RealMedia, ASF / WMV, Quicktime MOV, OGM

CD, VCD, DVD, CUE Sheets

The formats that can be output are as follows.

MP3, Ogg Vorbis, AAC, AAC + / Parametric Stereo, AMR NB / WB, MusePack, WMA

FLAC, WavPack, Monkey's Audio (APE, APL), OptimFrog, WMA Lossless, WAV

H.264, Xvid, DivX 4/5, MPEG 1/2/4, H.263, Flash Video, etc.

AVI, MPEG / VOB, Matroska, MP4, PMP (PSP Media Player? Format)
